text: this month we're loving on butter
melting today we're loving it on chicken
I'm gonna make the buttermilk marinated
chicken that you're gonna be making
forever super simple super delicious
you're gonna love it
start with 2 cups of buttermilk in your
bowl make sure it's nice and big enough
cuz you're going to marinate your
chicken right in here so use a big bowl
and then chop up some herbs today we're
using dill fresh dill which goes so well
with the Tang enos of the buttermilk and
then zest of one lemon save the juice or
something else make a salad dressing all
right once your lemon is all zested like
I said save your lemon for something
else don't throw it away add a teaspoon
of black pepper and a teaspoon and a
half of coarse salt stir that together
getting little clumps of black pepper in
here break those up give it a taste you
don't have to but I like to mmm it's so
good you could use this as a salad
dressing if you want to now I probably
have dill between my teeth do I add the
chicken this is one whole chicken cut up
into pieces and you just throw it in
there marinate it for eight hours I
recommend making this 5-minute marinade
in the morning coming home at night
taking it out throwing and throwing it
in the oven and you have a delicious
dinner on the table in what seems to be
no time at all make sure everything is
submerged and then wrap it up in plastic
wrap and throw it in the fridge at least
eight hours chilled it's been sitting
for eight hours
unfortunately the marinade is good for
nothing so you're going to have to throw
it away
lift your chicken out and let most of it
drip back into the bowl you're going to
Pat it dry so that there's not a lot of
excess marinade the the marinade has
already done its job which is to make it
taste delicious and to tenderize it just
slightly so you don't need an excess of
it there's too much excess on the pan it
might burn so Pat that up too and then
if you really wanted to you could line
this with foil to help
I did not do that put them in a 450
degree oven until they're gold and brown
and cooked through that'll take about 25
minutes at long last the chicken is
ready look at that it's golden and
delicious as I promised I love when that
happens use some clean tongs to put it
on your platter don't be using those
dirty tongs or I'll be very upset with
you if you wanted to you could serve
some fresh lemon wedges on the side of
this that would be delicious and some
people like to eat fresh herbs you can
put some fresh herbs on there to go
crazy make some mashed potatoes make a
delicious fresh salad like a Greek salad
would be so good with this still I don't
care what you serve with it I just want
you to try this chicken dish once let me
know what you think
buttermilk how I love thee
